exec: tests ["Limits verified for per Transaction "]= pertransaction===environment["Per Transaction"]+".00";
tests ["Limits verified for per day "]= perday===environment["Per Day"]+".00";
tests ["Limits verified for per week"]= perweek===environment["Per Week"]+".00";
tests ["Limits verified for per month"]= permonth===environment["Per Month"]+".00";
